NRK Filter
Customize your news experience on NRK.no. This extension automatically detects active categories on the site, giving you checkboxes to filter out the news topics you don't want to see. Not interested in sports, politics, or other specific topics? Simply turn them off and enjoy a personalized news feed tailored to your interests.
